title: I actually feel a little sorry for low elo....
body:
So i'm smurfin and i got placed in silver 2, the amount of trolls is crazy, you get an Ezreal that decides to troll and builds a Triforce and Gauntlet, you get someone who doesn't get his mid lane so he picks Teemo and says "i'm trolling gonna sit in there jungle all game", you get another troll who didn't really have any reason actually, his previous game he trolled and he says hes gonna troll this game again.

I'm amazed at how bad it actually is, do trolls not realize that the reason they cant climb is because they're trolling? Maybe, just maybe if you didn't troll, you wouldn't be so bad and you wouldn't be in elo hell? Granted these trolls are probably kids like 15 years old and there brain isn't fully developed, but still, this is kinda why a kick option in lobby and a harsher punishment for trolls is a good idea.

Doing the honors of dodging for the other players is startin to get a little annoying.

replies.body:
SCIENCE B!TCH

No one's brains are fully developed till around over 18 :D
Last i checked your brain isn't fully developed till your 21.
lol i dunno i made it up xDD
Idk either i just heard it was 21, cant remember where i heard it from though.

>an Ezreal that decides to troll and builds a Triforce and Gauntlet

If I had a dollar for every time I was versing an Ezreal who used this build and won...
I had a game where they brought lich bane in aswell XD

My placement was alright (got silver 3 in the end), it was actually competitive for the most part and I liked it quite a bit. I was like "man why haven't I joined ranked by now, I was missing out so much".

Then out into the actual Ranked:

* First game out of placement, there wasn't actually trolls per se, just a lot of typing between the 2 teams and ofc inside the team, and you know how it would end up, it became a blame fest that discouraged people and all that. 

* Second game was both top and mid lane feeding going something like 0/3/0 and 1/5/0 by like 10 min mark, then they just started to go negative attitude no matter what I say/encourage so we lost that one. 

* Third game I got so sick of supporting I went Yi mid, did make a few mistakes here and there though but the most major problem was that enemy team had 3 fotm/meta picks that were just so good we would get our arses kicked the instant team fight started. It wasn't fun by any stretch of the imagination. Our team wasn't the most efficient in some categories and we got wiped, hard and it is just not enjoyable to see normal team comp stands NO CHANCE against tryhards.

So yer I was like "Nope" and now I am giving Ranked a rest, hoping the scar wears off so I can go back to it again.

I mean I sorta like Ranked, it has banning and counter picking which I, while not the biggest fan of it, like the concept and hope to see that in my games.

> 
> I mean I sorta like Ranked, it has banning and counter picking which I, while not the biggest fan of it, like the concept and hope to see that in my games.

Normal Draft plz

Yeah its funny because in norms you often go against a team thats gnar top kat mid j4 jungle and leo/graves bot.

Whereas in rank gnar, kat j4 would most likely be banned. I find its easier to play weaker picks in rank than normals atm.
Welp I'm bronze 4 and I'll say it's pretty noice being bronze 4, perhaps next time I won't solo

I had the exact same conversation with my buddy just yesterday about having a lobby kick system in place. When you're trying to climb out of the lower ranks trolls are the number one obstacle and a lobby kick vote would help immensely.

It would also result in abuse. I think just wait until the season settles down, then you can climb.
What if all the trolls in low elo were high elo players minimising the amount of players in said high elo by trolling in low elo on smurfs?!?!?!??!?!?
